svg.title: Standalone vs. Workflow Execution
svg.desc: Split-screen showing three modes of operation: Full 15-Phase Workflow, Skill Chains, and Standalone Skill execution. Demonstrates flexibility from comprehensive to single-skill use.
svg.text: USE AS LITTLE OR AS MUCH AS YOU NEED

g.text: Use as little or as much as you need.
Every skill works alone. Every skill works better together.
